name: Semeru
description: A breathtaking mountain with picturesque views.

name: Fuji
description: A symbol of Japan, offering a majestic climb.

name: Everest
description: The highest mountain in the world and a legendary climb.

name: K2
description: Known as the Savage Mountain for its challenging ascent.

name: Denali
description: The highest peak in North America with awe-inspiring views.

name: Kilimanjaro
description: The tallest mountain in Africa, known for its biodiversity.

name: Aconcagua
description: The highest peak in South America, ideal for experienced climbers.

name: Elbrus
description: A dormant volcano and the highest peak in Europe.

name: Vinson
description: A remote mountain in Antarctica's icy wilderness.

name: Mont Blanc
description: The highest peak in the Alps, popular for skiing and climbing.

name: Matterhorn
description: A stunning, pyramid-shaped mountain in the Alps.

name: Table Mountain
description: Famous for its flat top and panoramic views of Cape Town.

name: Makalu
description: A stunning mountain with sharp ridges and challenging climbs.

name: Lhotse
description: Close to Everest, known for its steep vertical walls.

name: Cho Oyu
description: The sixth-highest mountain in the world, offering easier climbs.

name: Mount St. Helens
description: Known for its 1980 volcanic eruption and fascinating geology.

name: Rainier
description: A majestic volcano with glaciers and wildflower meadows.

name: Annapurna
description: Known for its deadly ascents and breathtaking scenery.

name: Olympus
description: Fabled as the home of the Greek gods in mythology.

name: Mount Cook
description: The tallest peak in New Zealand, surrounded by glaciers.
